concept-wr.title: Glance Dimensioning for Controller Node Storage

conbody.p: CGTS-3888 Add letters to equations, move backup to lastThe /opt/cgcs partition is used by various controller applications as data storage that is replicated between the controller nodes. For the Standard Configuration with Controller Storage and Titanium Server CPE configuration the partition is also used for used for Glance image storage and is therefore a configurable size. For the Standard Configuration with Dedicated Storage the size is fixed at 10 GB. To determine the logical disk capacity requirement for images, calculate the total expected image requirement plus some growth margin.

sl.sli: X = Image Storage Requirement = N * AvgImageSize + Margin
